channel.title: 有线网卡 on Lloyd

item.title: Ubuntu 20.04 安装 e1000e 有线网卡驱动
item.description: 前言 首先确实是否安装了网卡驱动。 1 2 3 4 5 6 7 8 9 $ ifconfig lo: flags=73<UP,LOOPBACK,RUNNING> mtu 65536 inet 127.0.0.1 netmask 255.0.0.0 inet6 ::1 prefixlen 128 scopeid 0x10<host> loop txqueuelen 1000 (Local Loopback) RX packets 3549 bytes 283497 (283.4 KB) RX errors 0 dropped 0 overruns 0 frame 0 TX packets 3549 bytes 283497 (283.4 KB) TX
